name: Skunk
description:
I stopped coloring my hair during COVID lockdown (March 2020) and let my hair go gray. My colored hair was very dark and the new growth created a large white line on top of my head (like a skunk!)

In this game, I fictionalized my anxiety about having to go back to work and face my colleagues looking like a skunk.

Embracing my gray hair is another part of my journey in accepting myself as a middle-age woman.

HOW TO PLAY:

Press Enter

Use the Arrows to move and interact.

NOTE: The game has only one level.
